title: Update Available
message: A new version of KeyWorld is available with exciting new features and improvements!
features: Improved performance and faster loading times
Enhanced user interface with better navigation
New search functionality for better transport tracking
release_notes: This update includes significant performance improvements, a redesigned user interface, and several bug fixes to enhance your experience with KeyWorld shipping services.

1.0.2: Fixed crash when searching for transport codes

server_maintenance.maintenance_message: We are currently performing maintenance. Please try again later.
